sentences.en: Digital priced the new line at less than half the cost of comparable mainframes.
sentences.cn: Digital公司新产品的定价比同类主机的一半还要低。

sentences.en: digital terrestrial and digital satellite broadcasting
sentences.cn: 数字陆上广播和数字卫星广播

sentences.en: Filmmaking was transformed by digital editing, digital f/x, and digicams.
sentences.cn: 数字剪辑、数码特效以及数码摄像机改变了电影摄制方式。

sentences.en: International Roaming is your digital mobile phone's passport to travel but the cost of calls is high.
sentences.cn: 国际漫游服务可使数字手机在全球畅通无阻，但话费却很高。

sentences.en: It will need different microchips to reconvert the digital code back into normal TV signals.
sentences.cn: 把数字信号重新转换回通常的电视信号需要另外的微芯片。

sentences.en: Manufacturers are working on a new generation of cheaper digital radios.
sentences.cn: 制造商正在研制价格更便宜的新一代数字收音机。

sentences.en: Pictures are scanned into a form of digital information that computers can recognize.
sentences.cn: 照片被扫描成某种电脑可以识别的数字资料。

sentences.en: The analogue signals from the video tape are converted into digital code.
sentences.cn: 采自该录像带的模拟信号被转换成数字代码。

sentences.en: The BBC has just successfully demonstrated a new digital radio transmission system.
sentences.cn: 英国广播公司刚刚成功地演示了一套新的数字无线电传输系统。
数字显示的读数是正确的.

sentences.en: The hearing-impaired say digital phones interfere with hearing aids.
sentences.cn: 听觉障碍者反映数字电话会对助听器造成干扰。

sentences.en: The signal will be converted into digital code.
sentences.cn: 信号会被转变为数字代码。

sentences.en: The system provides a digital readout of the vehicle's speed.
sentences.cn: 这个系统提供车辆速度的电子读数。

sentences.en: The unit includes built-in digital effects like reverb.
sentences.cn: 这个设备具有诸如混响之类的内置数码音效。

sentences.en: There's a digital watch on the table.
sentences.cn: 桌子上有一块数字式手表.

words.tran_cn: 数字；手指或足趾；一指宽
数字化；洋地黄疗法；洋地黄丸
数字器，[计] 数字转换器
[计] 数字化，数位化，数码化

phrases.tran_cn: 数字摄像机；数字照相机
数位资讯，数字信息；数据

trans.tran_cn: 数码的，数字显示的，脚趾的
trans.tran_en: using a system in which information is recorded or sent out electronically in the form of numbers, usually ones and zeros
